biotools.summary: Splign is a utility for computing cDNA-to-Genomic, or spliced sequence alignments. At the heart of the program is a compartmentization algorithm which identifies possible gene duplications, and a refined alignment algorithm recognizing introns and splice signals.

bioschemas.name: Splign
